about_the_game:
The ultimate armor for Freyja. The power emanating from within fills Freyja with immense power and mana. The weight however slows her down.

Invulnerability +30%
MAX MP +10%
Ultimate damage +30%
Blink CD +10%

*This can be accessed from the "Dressing room" menu.

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

detailed_description:
The ultimate armor for Freyja. The power emanating from within fills Freyja with immense power and mana. The weight however slows her down.

Invulnerability +30%
MAX MP +10%
Ultimate damage +30%
Blink CD +10%

*This can be accessed from the "Dressing room" menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, AMD FX™-6300, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX750Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: The ultimate armor for Freyja. The power emanating from within fills Freyja with immense power and mana. The weight however slows her down. Invulnerability +30% MAX MP +10% Ultimate damage +30% Blink CD +10% *This can be accessed from the "Costume" menu.
